Decile capture rate data

Source: R/blr-plots-data.R
blr_prep_dcrate_data.Rd

Data for generating decile capture rate.

blr_prep_dcrate_data(gains_table)

Arguments

gains_table

An object of clas blr_gains_table

Examples

model <- glm(honcomp ~ female + read + science, data = hsb2,
             family = binomial(link = 'logit'))
gt <- blr_gains_table(model)
blr_prep_dcrate_data(gt)
#> # A tibble: 10 x 4
#>    decile total   `1` decile_mean
#>     <dbl> <int> <int>       <dbl>
#>  1      1    20    14        0.7 
#>  2      2    20    13        0.65
#>  3      3    20    10        0.5 
#>  4      4    20     7        0.35
#>  5      5    20     3        0.15
#>  6      6    20     3        0.15
#>  7      7    20     1        0.05
#>  8      8    20     2        0.1 
#>  9      9    20     0        0   
#> 10     10    20     0        0
